docs.text:
Overview


import audio.wave
from numpy import *

df = 44100
dt = 1.0 / df
f = 440.0
T = 3.0
t = r_[0.0:T:dt]
sound = sin(2*pi*f*t)

audio.wave.write(sound, "A4.wav")
docs.title: Overview
